pages.text: Ocean's Delight lets you dive into the depths of the ocean for new ingredients and recipes. $(br2)Harvest Guardians, Tentacles, and Sea Pickles to cook up a storm.

Start by doing some fishing, clearing out an Ocean Temple, and harvesting kelp and pickles from the seabed. $(br2)Prepare dishes like Squid Rings, Honey Fried Kelp, Cabbage Wrapped Elder Guardian, and Braised Sea Picles for a maritime feast worthy of Neptune himself.
Add a splash of salt to your meals with Ocean's Delight and satisfy your oceanic cravings with every bite!
